name: Survaft (Prototype)
description:
A rough start to a survival crafting game (currently no crafting in the game).  I get into the habit of starting cool projects and then getting sidetracked by my larger project.  I feel I should at least share what I have instead of letting it rot on my hard drive.

  • You can use tools to collect items.
  • There is Health, Hunger and Energy bars that can be refilled with items.
  • There is a large world that you can explore on foot or by boat.
  • There are a bunch of items to collect.
  • Currently the game loads a different player skin each time it loads. (start of character creation)

This game is just a prototype or early demo of something I am working on.  It could be built into something cool.
